paper_metadata.title: The Role of Muslim Immigrant NGOs in Poverty Alleviation: A Case Study of the Kurban Project by IGMG in Germany

component_b_assets.assets_evidence_citation: This paper aims to fill this gap by studying a Muslim immigrant NGO, Islamische Gemeinschaft Milli Go ¨ru ¨s ¸(IGMG), with a focus on its Kurban (meat distribution) projects in more than 70 countries between 2004 and 2009

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: Such activities create awareness about poverty among Muslim immigrants and directly contribute to poverty alleviation by aid, investment and projects
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: This paper has explored the character, working method and effect of an immigrant Islamic NGO through its kurban activities

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: This paper aims to fill this gap by studying a Muslim immigrant NGO, Islamische Gemeinschaft Milli Go ¨ru ¨s ¸(IGMG), with a focus on its Kurban (meat distribution) projects
evidence_citations.country_citation: Kurban (meat distribution) projects in more than 70 countries between 2004 and 2009
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: Such activities create awareness about poverty among Muslim immigrants and directly contribute to poverty alleviation by aid, investment and projects
